Few point to note
1. replace your database password api/.env
2. This application was tested/hosted using Xammp. for the htaccess, Go to Xammp's http.conf and enable 
    LoadModule rewrite_module modules/mod_rewrite.so
3. Find the sql file (schema-creation.sql) on the root of this folder.
4. Form works perfectly and you can load contect in nova-settings.mjs
